00189   FFNet &operator=(const FFNet &net) 
00190   {
00191     numberOfNeurons   = net.numberOfNeurons;
00192     bias              = net.bias;
00193     firstOutputNeuron = net.firstOutputNeuron;
00194     connectionMatrix  = net.connectionMatrix;
00195     weightMatrix      = net.weightMatrix;
00196     delta             = net.delta;
00197     d                 = net.d;
00198     dedw              = net.dedw;
00199     dmdw              = net.dmdw;
00200     w                 = net.w;
00201     if(z) delete [] z;
00202     if (numberOfNeurons) 
00203     {
00204         z = new double[numberOfNeurons];
00205     }
00206     else
00207     {
00208         z = NULL;
00209     }
00210     return *this;
00211   }

00438 //===========================================================================
00472   void activate(const Array<double> &in) {
00473     unsigned i, j;
00474     for(j = 0; j < inputDimension; j++) {
00475       z[j] = in(j);
00476     }
00477     for(i = inputDimension; i < firstOutputNeuron; i++) {
00478       z[i] = 0;
00479       for(j = 0; j < i; j++)
00480         if(connectionMatrix(i, j)) z[i] += z[j] * weight(i, j);
00481       if(connectionMatrix(i, bias)) z[i] += weight(i, bias); // bias
00482       z[i] =  g(z[i]);
00483     }
00484     for(i = firstOutputNeuron; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00485       z[i] = 0;
00486       for(j = 0; j < i; j++)
00487         if(connectionMatrix(i, j)) z[i] += z[j] * weight(i, j);
00488       if(connectionMatrix(i, bias)) z[i] += weight(i, bias); // bias
00489       z[i] = gOutput(z[i]);
00490     }
00491   }
00492
